quotes.quote: A memory is something that is consciously recalled, right? That's why sometimes, it can be mistaken or wrong. It's different from a memory locked deep within your heart.
I pity you. You just don't get it at all... there's not a thing I don't cherish!
People have many things pent up inside of themselves.
Embrace your dreams. If you want to be a hero, you need to have dreams.
